headline: Could SLB's (SLB) Geothermal Partnership Reveal a New Chapter in Its Low-Carbon Ambitions?
summary: Ormat Technologies and SLB recently announced a partnership to accelerate the development and commercialization of integrated geothermal assets, focusing on enhanced geothermal systems (EGS) and including a pilot project at an Ormat facility. This collaboration leverages the strengths of both companies to expand geothermal energy access beyond conventional regions, aiming to scale EGS technologies for a broader range of customers such as independent power producers, utilities, and data...

headline: SLB and Ormat to accelerate integrated geothermal asset development
summary: SLB and Ormat Technologies have announced an agreement to fast-track the development and commercialisation of integrated geothermal assets, including enhanced geothermal systems.

raw.headline: SLB and Ormat to accelerate integrated geothermal asset development
raw.summary: SLB and Ormat Technologies have announced an agreement to fast-track the development and commercialisation of integrated geothermal assets, including enhanced geothermal systems.

headline: SCHD: Sleep Well During A Market Bubble
summary: SCHD's defensive sectors, balanced weighting, and near 4% yield make it a safer place to wait out a potential storm. Read more on SCHD ETF here.
